div.div: Fishing trips used for bycatch estimation.
div.p: Map of the Norwegian coastline with registered trips (open blue circles) for the coastal reference fleet utilizing gillnets during 2006â€“2015. Numbers refer to statistical fishing area, where 2, 3 and 4 are referred to as north-east, 0, 5 and 37 are referred to as north-west, 6 and 7 as middle and 28, 8, 9, and 41 as south in the analysis.
